algorithms

Class Dijkstra<V,E extends WeightedEdge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.Dijkstra<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - type of the vertices of the graph
    E - type of the edges of the graph. Have to extend WeightedEdge

    public class Dijkstra<V,E extends WeightedEdge<V>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Dijkstra algorithm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dijkstra(DirectedGraph<V,E> graph, V source)
      Execute algorithm starting from source vertex

      java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> getDistances()
      Get map containing the shortest distance from the source vertex to each vertex.
      java.util.HashMap<V,V> getPredecessors()
      Get map containing the predecessor of each vertex in the shortest path from the source vertex.

    • Method Detail

      • getDistances

        public java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> getDistances()
        Get map containing the shortest distance from the source vertex to each vertex.
        Returns:
        HashMap of the vertices as keys and the distances as values

      • getPredecessors

        public java.util.HashMap<V,V> getPredecessors()
        Get map containing the predecessor of each vertex in the shortest path from the source vertex. If the predecessor is null, there is no path.
        Returns:
        HashMap of the vertices as keys and their predecessors as values

      • getVisited

        public java.util.HashSet<V> getVisited()
        Get set of the visited vertices
        Returns:
        HashSet of the visited vertices
